name: Batch Video Splitter
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Splits all video files in a source folder into smaller segments of a specified duration.

output_schema.name: data.batch_results
output_schema.description: A list of result objects for each processed folder pair.

output_schema.name: data.total_files_processed
output_schema.description: The total number of original video files processed across all jobs.

output_schema.name: data.total_segments_created
output_schema.description: The total number of smaller video clips created across all jobs.
